text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with spicy sausage ragu a super
easy unbelievably delicious pasta sauce
you can never have enough pasta sauce

going to throw in white wine not red
wine white wine
do not use red wine white wine do not

cook that until the wine almost
evaporates
don't walk away you'll burn it you have
to start over alright if it looks like

turn the heat up to high bring it to a

high turn it to low let it simmer
